channel.title: Starter only once?
channel.description: Well i know there isnt supposed to be tut requests, and there shouldnt be command tuts, but i really wanna know how i make it so starter only works once. So please help

item.title: Starter only once?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) { if(starters.contains(this.playerName.toLowerCase())) { sendMessage("You have already recieved your starter kit."); } else { addItem(IDHERE, AMOUNT); starters.add(this.playerName.toLowerCase()); } }

Declare this;

private ArrayList<String> starters = new ArrayList<String>();

And import the following;

java.util.ArrayList;

Read full topic

item.title: Starter only once?
item.dc:creator: @eric_owner2 eric owner2
item.description:
@eric_owner2 wrote:

[code] public int starter = 0;

add that with you’re ints.

[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”)) {
if (starter == 0) {
addItem(ITEMID, 1);
addItem(ITEMID, 1);
addItem(ITEMID, 1);
sendMessage(“This is your starter pack. Enjoy your time here on SERVERNAME Private PK”);
sendMessage(“TEXT U WOULD LIKE.”);
starter = 1;

}
else if (starter == 1) {
	sendMessage("You have already received your SERVER NAME starter pack!");

}
}
[/code]
add that with you’re commands.

you can add as many things as you would like.[/code]

Read full topic
